text: This section describes the HDFS collection and forwarding agents. These agents are available in batch workflow configurations. Prerequisites The reader of this information must be familiar with: The Apache Hadoop Project and Hadoop Distributed File System The section contains the following subsections: HDFS Agents Preparations HDFS Collection Agent HDFS Forwarding Agent
title: HDFS Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
